changeSet.author: Santhosh, Shireesha

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM program_workflow_state WHERE program_workflow_id = 2 AND program_workflow_state_id = 8 AND retired IS FALSE AND concept_id IN (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name = "Network Follow-up" AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" AND voided IS FALSE);

changeSet.comment: Setting the program workflow state id back to Network Follow-up
changeSet.sql: UPDATE program_workflow_state SET concept_id = (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name = "Network Follow-up" AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" AND voided IS FALSE) WHERE program_workflow_id = 2 AND program_workflow_state_id = 8 AND retired IS FALSE;

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Shireesha

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM program_workflow_state WHERE program_workflow_id = 2 AND program_workflow_state_id = 11 AND retired IS FALSE AND concept_id IN (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name = "Pre-Operative" AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" AND voided IS FALSE);

changeSet.comment: Setting the program workflow state id back to Pre-Operative
changeSet.sql: UPDATE program_workflow_state SET concept_id = (SELECT concept_id FROM concept_name WHERE name = "Pre-Operative" AND concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") WHERE program_workflow_id = 2 AND program_workflow_state_id = 11;

changeSet.author: Santhosh, Shireesha

changeSet.sql: SELECT concept_id INTO @conceptID1 FROM concept_name WHERE name = 'PHIA, Mouth opening test' AND concept_name_type="FULLY_SPECIFIED"; UPDATE concept_numeric SET units = "cm" where concept_id = @conceptID1;
